content: Can I request a review of this PR? It adds some straightforward lemmas about the operator norms of the projections on a product E x F of normed spaces.

You've got your reviews -- but just to note that usually when someone makes a comment and I deal with it, I resolve the conversation to make it clear to onlookers that it's been dealt with (in fact I do this for my own benefit, leaving conversations unresolved if there is still some dangling issue I want to deal with).
